20.eng-name: Tribute, Spoils, and Rulership (Kitab Al-Kharaj, Wal-Fai' Wal-Imarah)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn Shihab: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) took out his fifth from the booty of Khaybar, and divided the rest of it among those who attended the battle and among those who were away from it but attend the expedition of al-Hudaybiyyah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي حُكْمِ أَرْضِ خَيْبَرَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Ruling On The Land Of Khaibar
